001
002package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.node;
003
004import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.IModelDefinition;
005import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.INamedModelInstance;
006
007public interface IModelNodeItem<D extends IModelDefinition, I extends INamedModelInstance>
008    extends IDefinitionNodeItem<D, I> {
009
010  /**
011   * Retrieve the relative position of this node relative to sibling nodes.
012   * <p>
013   * A singleton item in a sequence will have a position value of {@code 1}.
014   * <p>
015   * The value {@code 1} is used as the starting value to align with the XPath
016   * specification.
017   *
018   * @return a positive integer value designating this instance's position within
019   *         a collection
020   */
021  int getPosition();
022
023  /**
024   * {@inheritDoc}
025   * <p>
026   * The parent can be an assembly or a document (in the case of a root assembly.
027   */
028  @Override
029  INodeItem getParentNodeItem();
030
031  @Override
032  IAssemblyNodeItem getParentContentNodeItem();
033}
